meanings.definition: Crassnesses - the quality of being crude or unrefined
meanings.sent1: Her crassnesses were evident in the way she spoke loudly in the quiet library.
meanings.sent2: The comedian's crassnesses often offended the more conservative audience members.
meanings.sent3: Despite his crassnesses, he somehow managed to charm his way into her heart.
meanings.sent4: The crassnesses of his jokes hit a new low at the comedy show.
meanings.sent5: The crassnesses of his behavior left a lasting impression on everyone present.

meanings.definition: Crassnesses - actions or behaviors that are lacking in sensitivity or tact
meanings.sent1: The crassnesses of his remarks made everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: She was shocked by the crassnesses displayed during the meeting.
meanings.sent3: Despite his crassnesses, he somehow managed to make her laugh.
meanings.sent4: The crassnesses of his behavior were like a slap in the face to those around him.
meanings.sent5: The crassnesses of his words lingered in the air long after he had left.
